summary: Four friends are fatefully thrown into a veritable hell in this ambient and sometimes truly poetic Swedish genre drama.
cast: Felice Jankell|Jessica Raita|Rasmus Luthander|Sven Boräng|Sannie Stridsberg|Robin Rothlin|Anna Rothlin|Andreas Rothlin Svensson|Birte Heribertson|Simon Koudriavtsev|Magnus Björkenstam|Magnus Gillberg|Lupus Nensén
title: Från djupet av mitt hjärta
